page.title: 08A Village Garage owner
page.content: Mr Sapsford's hobby is doing up old cars.He was born in Hankham but his family haven't always lived there.A change that Mr Sapsford hads noticed is that there is a lot more houses used to be.House is only 21 years old,he built it near the Nursery because of his old job at the Nursery.He goes shopping at langney on average once a week.His cars been in films such as "sherlock holmes",he has a ROLLS ROYCE and a bently and he sometimes uses them for weddings.One of the noticeable events recently has been the wedding at Mr and Mrs Glessings house.Another is the argument over thew Pevensey-by-pass.He doesn't rely on a bus service and if there was a village shop he would definatly use it.He has always been interested in engernearing so that is why he began on old cars.
